content: is everyone asking for a christmas stocking this year you can make lots of them with this easy pattern it s a classic design that will make each one a treasured heirloom materials * red heart super saver medium worsted weight yarn 7 oz/364 yd/198g per skein 1 skein each #332 ranch red a #633 dark sage b and #316 soft white c * sizes g/6/4mm and h/8/5mm crochet hooks or size needed to obtain gauge * yarn needle
